formulas.description: Returns the emoji to represent either late, on-time, or early tasks
formulas.raw: if(or(prop("num Timing") == 0, prop("num Timing") == 1), "游리  ", if(prop("num Timing") > 0, "游댮  ", "游릭  "))

formulas.description: Returns the text representation of late, on-time, or early tasks
formulas.raw: if(prop("num Timing") == 0, "Just in time", if(prop("num Timing") == 1, "1 day early", if(prop("num Timing") == -1, "1 day late", if(prop("num Timing") > 0, concat(format(prop("num Timing")) ," days late"), concat(format(-prop("num Timing")) ," days early")))))

formulas.description: Provides a numeric representation of the difference between due date and "do" date.
Provides a color-coded and concise description of how early or late a task is scheduled.
